sub_title: Senior Culinary Translator - Dutch > French and Team management at HelloFresh
summary:
As a French native speaker born and raised in France, I studied and graduated in three languages: English, Spanish and Dutch. I studied Languages Applied to International Business & Marketing - Sorbonne Nouvelle University – Paris) and Dutch (University of Amsterdam). I live in The Netherlands since 1999.

I worked for about 15 years for international commercial companies in France, Spain and the Netherlands.

Because of my academic background and my previous international corporate experience, I understood at a very early stage that languages were a crucial element at the moment of doing business. 

My goal? Make sure your message goes through into French!
